# E2E framework test

This guide validates the E2E test runner framework. All steps are read-only and have no side effects.

**If this guide fails, the issue is with the framework, not the guide content.**
**Step 1: Highlight action** - Highlights the Dashboards link in the navigation menu. Tests the highlight action and fix button (navmenu-open requirement).
blocks.tooltip: This step verifies that the highlight action works correctly and that the navmenu-open requirement can be satisfied via the Fix button.

blocks.content: **Step 2: Highlight action (skippable)** - Highlights the Explore link in the navigation menu. Tests that skippable steps work correctly.
blocks.tooltip: This step verifies that skippable steps are handled correctly by the E2E runner.

blocks.content: **Step 3: Highlight action** - Highlights the Alerting link in the navigation menu. Tests independent step execution.
blocks.tooltip: This step verifies that the E2E runner can execute multiple independent steps.

blocks.content:
## Validation complete

If you reached this point, all framework tests passed:

- ✅ Highlight action works
- ✅ Requirements handling works (navmenu-open)
- ✅ Fix button mechanism works
- ✅ Multiple step execution works
- ✅ Skippable step handling works
